meanings.definition: A person to whom a right or property is legally transferred.
meanings.sent1: The assignee of the house deed was thrilled to finally own a home.
meanings.sent2: The assignee of the inheritance received the family heirlooms.
meanings.sent3: The assignee of the treasure map set off on a thrilling adventure.
meanings.sent4: She was like the assignee of happiness, spreading joy wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: As the assignee of the secret recipe, he guarded it with great care.

meanings.definition: A person who is assigned a task or duty.
meanings.sent1: The assignee of the project completed it ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent2: The assignee of the homework forgot to bring it to class.
meanings.sent3: The assignee of dishwashing duty pretended to be a superhero with a soapy cape.
meanings.sent4: She was the assignee of the mission impossible, but she was determined to succeed.
meanings.sent5: As the assignee of the top-secret mission, he knew the fate of the world rested on his shoulders.
